ITerminalStorageTabClient<TerminalStorageSlotIngredient<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack,Integer>>
public class TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentItemStackCraftingClient extends TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack,Integer>
A client-side storage terminal ingredient tab for crafting with ItemStack instances.

    • getTabSettingsName

      public net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation getTabSettingsName()
      Returns:
      The tab name that will be used to store TerminalStorageState settings inside a tab. This can be used to modify in what tab certain settings are stored.

    • handleClick

      public boolean handleClick(net.minecraft.world.inventory.AbstractContainerMenu container, int channel, int hoveringStorageSlot, int mouseButton, boolean hasClickedOutside, boolean hasClickedInStorage, int hoveredContainerSlot, boolean isQuickMove)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Called when a mouse click happens in a gui.
      Specified by:
      handleClick in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<TerminalStorageSlotIngredient<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack,Integer>>
      Overrides:
      handleClick in class TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack,Integer>
      Parameters:
      container - The active container.
      channel - The active channel.
      hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      mouseButton - The mouse button.
      hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
      hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
      hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      isQuickMove - If the click comes from a quickMoveStack action
      Returns:
      If further click processing should stop.

    • isQuickMovePrevented

      public boolean isQuickMovePrevented(int slotIndex)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Dictates if a slot can have ITerminalStorageTabClient.handleClick(net.minecraft.world.inventory.AbstractContainerMenu, int, int, int, boolean, boolean, int, boolean) called on it by ContainerTerminalStorageBase.quickMoveStack(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player, int)
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the slot in question
      Returns:
      If vanilla quick move actions should apply to the given slot
